verses.verse: <S%G3004><s%> Now I Say, <S%G1161><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> As Long As <S%G3745><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heir <S%G2818><s%> An Infant <S%G3516><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> He Differs <S%G1308><s%> From A Bondman, Though <S%G1401><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Being; <S%G5607><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Guardians <S%G2012><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stewards <S%G3623><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time Before Appointed <S%G4287><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We, <S%G2249><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G1510><s%> Infants, <S%G3516><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elements <S%G4747><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G1510><s%> Held In Bondage; <S%G1402><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> He Might Ransom, <S%G1805><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Adoption <S%G5206><s%> We Might Receive. <S%G618><s%>

<S%G3754><s%> But Because <S%G1161><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Sons, <S%G5207><s%> Sent Forth <S%G1821><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Of His Son <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> , Your, <S%G5216><s%> Crying, <S%G2896><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Son; <S%G5207><s%> <S%G1487><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Heir <S%G2818><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Ye Were In Bondage <S%G1398><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> By Nature <S%G5449><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> Gods; <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3568><s%> But Now, <S%G1161><s%> Having Known <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3123><s%> But Rather <S%G1161><s%> Having Been Known <S%G1097><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Now <S%G4459><s%> Do Ye Return <S%G1994><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weak <S%G772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beggarly <S%G4434><s%> Elements <S%G4747><s%> To Which <S%G3739><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Anew <S%G509><s%> To Be In Bondage <S%G1398><s%> Ye Desire? <S%G2309><s%>
Days <S%G2250><s%> Ye Observe, <S%G3906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Months, <S%G3376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Times, <S%G2540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Years. <S%G1763><s%>
I Am Afraid Of <S%G5399><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Lest Somehow <S%G3381><s%> In Vain <S%G1500><s%> I Have Laboured <S%G2872><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Be <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> I Am, <S%G1473><s%> <S%G3754><s%> For I Also Am <S%G2504><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I Beseech <S%G1189><s%> You : <S%G5216><s%> In Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Ye Wronged. <S%G91><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Ye Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> ' In <S%G1223><s%> Weakness <S%G769><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> I Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> At The First; <S%G4386><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Temptation <S%G3986><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> My Flesh <S%G3450><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye Despised <S%G1848><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Rejected With Contempt; <S%G1609><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Ye Received <S%G1209><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Blessedness <S%G3108><s%> Your? <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3140><s%> For I Bear Witness <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> That, <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Possible, <S%G1415><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G1846><s%> Having Plucked Out <S%G302><s%> Ye Would Have Given Them <S%G1325><s%> To Me. <S%G3427><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> Enemy <S%G2190><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Have I Become <S%G1096><s%> Speaking Truth <S%G226><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%>

They Are Zealous After <S%G2206><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Rightly, <S%G2573><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Exclude <S%G1576><s%> You From Us <S%G5209><s%> They Desire, <S%G2309><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Ye May Be Zealous After. <S%G2206><s%>

<S%G2570><s%> But Right It Is <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Zealous <S%G2206><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Right Thing <S%G2570><s%> At All Times, <S%G3842><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3918><s%> My Being Present <S%G3165><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%>

Little Children <S%G5040><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Travail <S%G5605><s%> <S%G891><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Shall Have Been Formed <S%G3445><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You : <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G2309><s%> And I Was Wishing <S%G1161><s%> To Be Present <S%G3918><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Now, <S%G737><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Change <S%G236><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5456><s%> My Voice, <S%G3450><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> I Am Perplexed <S%G639><s%> As To <S%G1722><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

Tell <S%G3004><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> Ye Who <S%G3588><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Wish <S%G2309><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not Hear? <S%G191><s%>

<S%G1125><s%> For It Has Been Written, <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Had; <S%G2192><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Maid Servant, <S%G3814><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Free Woman. <S%G1658><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He <S%G3303><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Maid Servant, <S%G3814><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Has Been Born, <S%G1080><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Free Woman, <S%G1658><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise. <S%G1860><s%>

Which Things <S%G3748><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> Allegorized; <S%G238><s%> <S%G3778><s%> For These <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Covenants; <S%G1242><s%> <S%G1520><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai, <S%G4614><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bondage <S%G1397><s%> Bringing Forth, <S%G1080><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Hagar. <S%G28><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Hagar <S%G28><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Arabia, <S%G688><s%> <S%G4960><s%> And Corresponds <S%G1161><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> She Is In Bondage <S%G1398><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Children; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Above <S%G507><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Free <S%G1658><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Of Us. <S%G2257><s%>

It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> For, <S%G1063><s%> Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> O Barren <S%G4723><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Bearest Not; <S%G5088><s%> Break Forth <S%G4486><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cry, <S%G994><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Travailest Not; <S%G5605><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Desolate <S%G2048><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Of Her That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husband. <S%G435><s%>
<S%G2249><s%> But We, <S%G1161><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Like <S%G2596><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> Of Promise <S%G1860><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Are. <S%G2070><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Was Born <S%G1080><s%> Persecuted <S%G1377><s%> Him Born <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Now. <S%G3568><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture? <S%G1124><s%> Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Maid Servant <S%G3814><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Her Son, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> May Inherit <S%G2816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Maid Servant <S%G3814><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Free Woman. <S%G1658><s%>

So Then, <S%G686><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Are Not <S%G2070><s%> Of A Maid Servant <S%G3814><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Free Woman. <S%G1658><s%>
